name: 1,4-benzendiol, 2-(phenylmethyl)-
Reason: 1,4-Benzendiol base, with a melting point around 100 degrees Celsius, due to the presence of two phenyl groups, which can significantly increase the melting point due to their ability to enhance π-π interactions and overall molecular rigidity. Each phenyl group may contribute around +30 to +50°C.
